text: @narendramodi Modiji, any update on upscaling of labs or advanced machines to improve test result time?? We can’t just hang in there while doing taali, thaali and ghanta. Right? We need to know what the government is doing. #CoronaUpdatesInIndia #CoronavirusPandemic #Covid19India
